div.data-react-data-bundle:
{"notifications":[{"id":7365,"message":"Dear Nuestro School District Students, Parents, Staff and Community,


Nuestro School District will continue to be closed after Spring Break. We anticipate being closed through May 1, 2020. Of course, this is an everchanging situation and we will try to open sooner, if possible. I will continue to keep you updated throughout the school closure. Please see the most recent letter on this website for more information about the closure and upcoming virtual education. Please stay safe and healthy during this very difficult time.
 Sincerely,
Dr. Bal Dhillon","type":"overlay"}]}

a.title: School Meals During Closure
a.div:
During the closure, YCUSD Nutrition Services will continue to serve breakfast and lunch to all children ages 18 and under. Both meals will be distributed together in front of the school sites in a mobile walk-up or drive-thru meal service listed below between 8:30AM-10:00AM (Monday-Friday). This will begin Thursday, March 19th.
• Andros Karperos
• April Lane Elementary
• Bridge Street Elementary
• Riverbend Elementary
• River Valley High School
• Yuba City High School
• Bernard Children's Center
Click into this box for the flyer about these meals.

div.div:
Parents, if you have not had a chance to order a yearbook it is not too late. You can call 1-866-287-3096 or log on to www.YearbookOrderCenter.com. You will need our school's order number which is 20860. Please have orders in by April 10, 2020. We only order 20 extra yearbooks and they sell out fast at the end of the year.
Thank you! If you have any questions or concerns, please contact Angel Hill - PTO Treasurer/Yearbook Coordinator.

a.title: Supporting Your Child's Social-Emotional Needs
a.div: Please click this box for a letter with links to sites and videos about how to support your child's social-emotional needs during the school closure.

a.title: Nuestro School Merchandise
a.div: This site offers several options for spirit wear: t-shirts, sweatshirts, and even Pink October shirts. Just click into this box to be taken to the website and type in 'Nuestro'. You can then choose to enter as a Student or Faculty/Staff member.

p.span: Nuestro Elementary is a Kindergarten/Transitional Kindergarten through 8th Grade school. Nuestro Elementary School District provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment.

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
